thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute Hotel, centrally located
thread.title_full: Cute Hotel, centrally located - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sandra G
title: Cute Hotel, centrally located
text:
The hotel is conveniently located near Times Square. I got a great deal on booking.com.
The rooms are small but perfect since you're not really spending tons of time in the room. The bathroom in the room was large and great.
There is no restaurant on the premises which makes it a bit inconvenient if you had plans to eat at the hotel.
The pool is small but the kids loved it! I do wish that there was a hot tub instead of the sauna in the hotel.
Staff was great and friendly!
I would definitely stay there again if I were in the city.
